website_summaries.verdict: If you need top-quality drills and other power tools for almost any building, remodeling, or repair task, this is your best option.
pros: In addition to powerful drill and impact drivers, this impressive 20-volt 8-tool set includes nearly everything any do-it-yourselfer or contractor needs for serious work
Comes with 2 batteries, charger, and 2 carrying bags
cons: It's expensive, but you also get a lot for the price
The oscillating tool is subpar compared to the other pieces of the set
The battery charger has been known to malfunction

website_summaries.verdict: Tool shoppers on a budget will be impressed with this huge eight-piece kit. Though some minor quality concerns exist, the value of this comprehensive pick can't be beat.
pros: Packed with tools for a surprisingly low price
Circular saw, reciprocating saw, and jigsaw, plus drill and impact drivers, oscillating multi-tool, cutoff grinder, and LED flashlight
Comes with two batteries and charger
cons: The durability of the oscillating tool is questionable

customer_reviews.title: Not as Good as DeWalt but well worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Not built as well built as my old DeWalt set but work great and you get the complete collection for an amazing price. I use all of these and they all work well. One thing I noticed that I didn't quite like is that the trigger on the devices is not smooth. Kinda jumps from real slow to full blast with no smooth transition. Other than that It was well worth the money. The same set by DeWalt would have cost almost a grand. Again this set is worth the money and after using for a few months now almost daily, they have worked reliably.
customer_reviews.author: Emerson Biggons

customer_reviews.title: 5 of 5 stars . Worth every penny ..
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love it . I was surprised with all that was included with this set . All saws come with blades , sander comes with sand paper, they even included bits for the impact and driver . Nice bright flash light and two bags to keep all of them organized. I love the charger also. Definitely worth the money .. Update 4/23/2020 everything is still working and in great shape , even the batteries ! No problems at all and I love them ! Very dependable and good for the money .
customer_reviews.author: Josh & Sav

customer_reviews.title: THIS SET IS GREAT...
customer_reviews.text: This set is great. The only problem is the bags are very flimsy. Broke the zipper on one first use. Tools are surprisingly powerful. Second, lower mA Battery is only good for very short period, better to just leave it on Light. Def need to get additional Batteries. Nice feature: when Battery is low, Units just stop functioning, not running down. Beat the hell outa the Vibrating Multi Tool, is fine as long as you get it too hot.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Wolchko

customer_reviews.title: Great kit for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great kit for the price. You get everything you need including two bags. At $400 this is basically $50 a tool with 2 bags, 2 batteries, and a charger thrown in for free.
customer_reviews.author: JeffreyTop Contributor: Raspberry Pi

customer_reviews.title: Excellent set of tools
customer_reviews.text: Excellent set of tools, haven't had one disappoint me yet, saws all seems to run forever on a battery and has the power to do most any job. Best selection for the money, and a darn good brand ! HIGHLY RECOMMENDED !!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: James Joy

customer_reviews.title: perfect, everyting works exelent
customer_reviews.text: perfect , everyting works exelent , its what i was thinkin.for , and the best , dewalt batteries are compatible with porter cable tools and viceversa
customer_reviews.author: Victor L.

customer_reviews.title: Glad I didn't
customer_reviews.text: Don't get me wrong. The headline is a play on words. Prior to buying this product I spent a long time debating which one of these kits to pick. Almost went with a few different expensive "Name" brands but at last minute chose this one instead. Now I am glad I made this choice. I am remodeling a house I just bought and am actually looking for things to repair or build so I can use these tools. Battery packs have surprised me in the usage I am getting out of them. Have had no problems at all and very pleased with their performance.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tool , but h.d.. 499 is much better
customer_reviews.text: The drill chuck keeps on getting loose , the circular saw is very poor made , flashlights is cheap , saw is pretty good. The kit is not bad but I got a dewalt 20v xr for 499 at the hd , which in my opinion works really good power is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Combo
customer_reviews.text: Since I purchased these tools 6 months ago I have used them 5 days a week some more than others some hardly at all and some all the time through hot sun and Oregon rain. Both the circular saw and the sawzall have stopped working and are being fixed under warranty at the local shop. The impact driver is about to fail for good and has not little power anymore. In the end this combo is a great value and gets the job done for 6 months, then its time to buy new nicer tools with more money.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Excellent kit just about every tool you'll need to do any job. I BOUGHT two after market batterys they work very well.
customer_reviews.author: zacscott

customer_reviews.title: Awesome purchase at the right time.
customer_reviews.text: How did we use this product? Well let's see we are STILL using this awesome product, we were totally destroyed by Hurricane Michael and lost everything then someone stole our pickup with all our tools (we had the only keys) at any rate we had nothing so I started ordering I heard good things about Porter cable and they lived up to it, not only are they holding up to a totally rebuild but the delivery was next to a miracle in our destroyed town. Thanks Porter cable for making our rebuild much easier.
customer_reviews.author: cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I replaced my old Porter Cable NiCad kit after 10 years. Loved that kit and love this new one. Every tool you need. The two carry bags are a bit light in terms of canvas thickness. We'll see how long they last. It also comes with two batteries, a small one (1.5 Ah) and a larger one (4.0 Ah). I purchased a dual battery set with another charger and two 6.0 Ah batteries to complete the set.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great Set of Tools!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great toolset for a handyman and I would have given it more stars but one of the tools is missing the two springs that help the battery easily eject. Does anyone know where I can get those two little springs and what type/size they are?
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I have DeWalt everything else and needed a few tools in this kit and the deal was too good to pass up. Tools work great, love that they gave me to batteries, a saw blade, recip blade, jigsaw blade, grinding wheel, cutting wheels, and multi-tool blades. I'll probably buy another charger and batteries and keep adding to this collection.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tools for the DIY home improvement enthusiast
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tools for the DIY home improvement enthusiast. Not the best, but far better than much of the competition.
customer_reviews.author: Clintz323

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal Value!
customer_reviews.text: The idea of getting all the necessities in one discounted price seemed too good to be true! I am so impressed with the quality and performance. Buying all the items would’ve kept me from collecting everything, trust me I did my research. The battery life isn’t an issue, I thought I would have to purchase a few more to keep me from having to stop what I was doing, but I was wrong... I definitely recommend this package!
customer_reviews.author: jim looman

customer_reviews.title: Better than the newer version
customer_reviews.text: A really fantastic tool set. Powerful and compact. Every tool in this bundle is great. The newer version has a few substitutions that make this bundle worth the extra money. Estimated delivery time was 30 days, it was actually delivered in about 3 days.
customer_reviews.author: Eric O

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Love all the tools.... Just bought this when I moved into our first house.... I have used all of the tools since I have been here.... They work great and totally worth the bundle pack.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley Hamand

customer_reviews.title: Great value durable
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I had problems with was your batteries. Just after one day the max pack started blinking red saying it was bad when I went to charge it. I had it fully charged and used it one day until it lost charge. Plugged it in and it started blinking red.
customer_reviews.author: scott

customer_reviews.title: Tools are awesome tool bags zippers are junk
customer_reviews.text: So far after about week of having them so far so good the tool duffel bags though you get with them are garbage zipper has already broke looking for heavy duty tool bag though but other then that awesome deal and was shipped asap
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great price! Feels a bit cheaper than D*****
customer_reviews.text: Finally moved from 14.4V to 20V. Great price! Feels a bit cheaper than D*****, but it'll do for my needs. More than enough saws. Worked great on the first project.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Michaels

customer_reviews.title: ... deal on this at the time of purchase was sweet! Thanks Amazon
customer_reviews.text: The deal on this at the time of purchase was sweet! Thanks Amazon! Tools (IMO) Are very good! People have different opinions on everything but if you’re a person that takes care of your stuff! Than this is a no brainer. I’m a DIY’er myself, kitchens, bathrooms, etc.no problems.
customer_reviews.author: RTS-LUV

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Great buy. I purchased this to do some odd jobs around the house and all of the products work great. I especially like the skill saw and the grinder. I highly recommend this product to anyone looking for a house hold tool.
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: Charger problem
customer_reviews.text: I get this tools last year and till now I was able use it only 5-6 time becouse original charger stop charging after 2 days, after I got new charger with 2 more batterys and again after 4-5 days second charger stoped charging. Now I have very good tools but I cant use it again.
customer_reviews.author: Gevorg

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I have had excellent luck with Porter's than the yellow brand. The batteries and tools are quite durable. I previously had (and still do) an 18 volt version and the 20 volts are doing well. The batteries seem to last a bit longer and the tools seem slightly more powerful.
customer_reviews.author: Robert21

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this set. He uses it all the time and was very happy with the included tools. Bought some extra batteries to be able to switch them out and keep working!
customer_reviews.author: Maya McCarroll

customer_reviews.title: Batteries do not last long
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a few months back and its worth the money for sure, this set will take care of any household project! I built tank stands, cut rebar for laying garden timbers, and lots of other projects have had no problem with the functionality of these tools. I will say that the batteries dont last as long as I would like so buy some better batteries other than that a solid buy.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: Well made, and has a lot of uses. I had an issue with a saw and it was replaced right away. Great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: BHG308

customer_reviews.title: Great set but not for professional heavy use
customer_reviews.text: Great set but not for professional heavy use. Plenty of power. Good battery life. Easy to use. Mine did not come with the batter charging dock that is pictured. It came with the 1 A/H charger that clips on to the battery which is not as fast or durable.
customer_reviews.author: Colton S.

customer_reviews.title: Quality set!
customer_reviews.text: Great tools long lasting batteries, I built an insert to use the circular saw as a table saw an the batteries last longer than expected. Flashlight is super bright, both drills are powerful, haven't used the rest of the tools yet but wouldn't expect less. Sander doesn't come with the set!
customer_reviews.author: Shana

customer_reviews.title: Recoomend for small home projects
customer_reviews.text: I have built a chicken run, dog run, camping platform and cabinates. Meets and exceets my expectations. This replaced my old Ryobi gear and I've been very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Butler

customer_reviews.title: Good Deal!
customer_reviews.text: Love it, Been running a “green” brand, but the batteries stopped working. At $100 a pop, I expect more. Porter Cable is my new go to.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Taylor

customer_reviews.title: loved them.
customer_reviews.text: owned a set before...loved them...10 years still strong tools. Upgraded to 20v system with 5amp hour batteries...love it!
customer_reviews.author: Albert L. Cromp, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great variety tool set that's what I love about it
customer_reviews.text: Great variety tool set that's what I love about it. So far the tools are holding up for personal use around the house. I plan on buying a few more 20v batteries for longer use but so far small projects the battery last. The price was reasonable @ 359.99 bought several months back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Warranty
customer_reviews.text: Have not even had this product a year and the impact driver isn't working properly. It'll work for a little bit and then it will stop I'm not sure as far as the warranty goes getting this replaced
customer_reviews.author: Laura E.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice set. Have used the grinder
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set. Have used the grinder, the drill, impact driver and the Sawsall. All worked great! Very pleased with the tools. The bags to carry them are satisfactory. The zipper on one pulled a part on one. I wasnt concerned with the bags in the first place, as I will be ising a tool chest to transport them on a frequent basis.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Worth the $$
customer_reviews.text: Great set of tools, not 5 stars because this new set of impact drills Porter Cable sells no longer has a hook for your pocket or even a magnetic bit holder. Really dissapointed because its used the most..
customer_reviews.author: Dave Holliday

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price.  Made well.  I like it will you?
customer_reviews.text: Amazing price and happy with the quality. Came with a larger and smaller battery. A big plus.
customer_reviews.author: bergie

customer_reviews.title: Great tools, great price!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tools!! Best product I have ever buy on Amazon. Very happy with deal! Using them for more than 2 years!
customer_reviews.author: Yevgeniy

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We got this set for our son for Christmas. We did a lot of research, looking for the best and who has a lot of great reviews. This one came out on top. Our son is a new home owner and needs the best tools for the job.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Gore

customer_reviews.title: Works great easy to use love them
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the price can't complain jig saw cover breaks easilybknky downfall
customer_reviews.author: Michael hobson

customer_reviews.title: Porter Cable used to be a great product not so if this is any example
customer_reviews.text: The drill broke almost immediately and the trigger for the impact gun works sporadically. Porter Cable used to be a great product not so if this is any example. I can't return because it wasn't brought to my attention until Amazons return policy was up.
customer_reviews.author: CHARLES DYDZUHN

customer_reviews.title: Great battery operated tool set
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality tools! Great battery life and plenty of power.
customer_reviews.author: BRUCE RUCKER

customer_reviews.title: would be nice to have a double charger had to buy another ...
customer_reviews.text: has all the tools needed to do any wood or metal cutting and 2 batteries. would be nice to have a double charger had to buy another charger and battery to keep up with the tools i use
customer_reviews.author: krejcia

customer_reviews.title: Good buy great tools
customer_reviews.text: Have Porter Cable tools for while awesome product for the price
customer_reviews.author: jesse stanley

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Received my combo on Jan 5, 2018 already used the drill and oscillating tool works great. Can't wait to use grinder to see if it's as good as the rest.
customer_reviews.author: volsman98

customer_reviews.title: Excellent products
customer_reviews.text: Excellent products great power line ght weight easy to use
customer_reviews.author: David Archibald

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My honey was so happy with this gift....he is going around the neighborhood and showing off his new tools...
customer_reviews.author: tracy duro

customer_reviews.title: Great value for a home gamer setup!
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is a great set. I don't think it would stand up to the rigors of a job site, but for projects around the house/occasion use, there is every tool you will every need.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't get the jig saw to stay level. Broke ...
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't get the jig saw to stay level. Broke the bottom price while tightening to much. Can I buy the peice that Broke?
customer_reviews.author: B. Alderson

customer_reviews.title: Good bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to remodel my kitchen and pantry. They have held up perfectly. Not crazy about the bags, so I bought a large tote to put them in. Very sturdy and get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Moonshadow0326

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good power better then previous set.Bought based on other reviews i read.Nice set.
customer_reviews.author: n.s.

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Used these with my dads company for years. Two of his impact drills broke, however each time porter cable either fixed or replaced for free. Decided to buy my own kit for home. Most tools and biggest batteries for price.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Fell

customer_reviews.title: Affordable battery operated tool set.
customer_reviews.text: Replaced most of my corded power tools with this set. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: MARK A KRATZER

customer_reviews.title: Change the packaging
customer_reviews.text: Came in a big box saying porter cable that was the bad ... cmon guys advertising to the porch pirates is ridiculous. My neighbor called me said i had tools setting on the porch. Other than that came fast everything works. Great addition to my work tools.
customer_reviews.author: Robert jones

customer_reviews.title: Buy the Porter Cable 2pack battery set to go with it.
customer_reviews.text: This tool bundle is a must for the DIY guy, it contains all the most commonly used power tools. The every tool is good quality, and plenty of power. This price is by far the best deal available. Was skeptical at first, but took a chance. This turned out to be the best purchase of the year.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri Drennon

customer_reviews.title: Buy the offi
customer_reviews.text: Could not be happier. Glad I went with the official retail version for a bit more rather than the cheapo unofficial from other retailers.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Casey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really love my new set of tools. Batteries seem to last well and the weight is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent set. I just wish it had more batteries. Love all of the tools. To use continuously you need to use only 1 battery at a time so you can be charging the other.
customer_reviews.author: josh g.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I love having this as a woman around the house to do the things I need to do when I want to do them
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Choate

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent quality for the price. The parts are still working, even after building a couch with them.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Great price!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for an early birthday gift and he absolutely loves it!!! I don't know much about tools but my husband said it was a great deal for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Golden

customer_reviews.title: Tools as Guft
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my son. He loves the set and uses them all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Susan In Alpine

customer_reviews.title: Well made tools.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Good assortment for the price. Gave to my son for Christmas and he uses them everyday for work.
customer_reviews.author: crystal ashton

customer_reviews.title: seems light weight and not as good as what was listed
customer_reviews.text: The charger that came with this wasnt the charger on the order, seems light weight and not as good as what was listed. The charger I received was a PCC699L and the charger on the order was supposed to be a PCC680L
customer_reviews.author: Steve V.

customer_reviews.title: It was nice to put in two dog doors
customer_reviews.text: It was nice to put in two dog doors, one in a metal door and the other in a solid wood door. I had every tool for the job in these two bags...
customer_reviews.author: Bayernscr

customer_reviews.title: Recharge your batteries and get better accessories and these tools will last a while
customer_reviews.text: It's the best tool kit if you're big into DIY kind of stuff, the drill and impact wrench are the best tools here in my opinion
customer_reviews.author: Wilbert Sorto

customer_reviews.title: Tools do not have the power for a DIY basement ...
customer_reviews.text: Tools do not have the power for a DIY basement renovation.....Saw will not cut through even an inch of 2 x 4 without jamming and needing blade changed....that said, I guess I got what I paid for. Wish I had spent more so I would be able to actually use what I bought.
customer_reviews.author: BDW

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Got these for home projects with extra batteries and they all work great. No problems.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All came in excellent condition. Over packed but that's OK because it ...
customer_reviews.text: All came in excellent condition. Over packed but that's OK because it all came in great shape. Nice to have two batteries but ordered two more large back ups. Tested all tools and they are going to work great. Complete package is going in my Motor Home. Going to be really convenient while traveling.
customer_reviews.author: mpembo

customer_reviews.title: Sweet
customer_reviews.text: Awesome set for the price. Used almost every tool when I built my fence
customer_reviews.author: WILLY

customer_reviews.title: (would be great to have linear lights on the tools)
customer_reviews.text: Son loves the whole set. (would be great to have linear lights on the tools)

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic and powerful, and great that blades and attachments came with it. The batteries last a long time
customer_reviews.author: dave mcgill

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Used impact drill 3 times and it broke in half.. Contacted seller no response. If i could give it no stars i would. very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Danny Kemp

customer_reviews.title: Value for the dollar.
customer_reviews.text: I use these at work and they work well but have less power than my coworkers more expensive tools.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Hill

customer_reviews.title: Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I carry this set on one of our fire trucks, and we use them for just about everything. So far they haven't let us down.

customer_reviews.title: A little bit disappointed, haven’t tried the kit yet
customer_reviews.text: The charger that we received was not the one shown!! A little bit disappointed, haven’t tried the kit yet..

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality tools
customer_reviews.text: Battery charger stopped working almost immediately. Very poor quality tools. Light plastic not very durable.

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Showed up days early in time to fix my gate that blew off in the last storm!

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Love them, lots of power and the batteries last longer than I expected. Wish the carry bags had pouches or pockets for accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Lord

customer_reviews.title: Used all the tools in this set and very pleased with the performance and battery life
customer_reviews.text: Used all the tools in this set and very pleased with the performance and battery life. Definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: William W.

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend for around the house use
customer_reviews.text: Everything was very well put together and it came with tons of accessories. I highly recommend for around the house use.

customer_reviews.title: Great price very good tools
customer_reviews.text: very nice tool set but nothing beats corded tools but i use them at work most days thank you-M

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: So far I event use much but the cordless drill is already broken.
customer_reviews.author: jason

customer_reviews.title: Cheap batteries
customer_reviews.text: Plastic is low quality, batteries don't last at all. I think my kids got more use out the empty box they came in.
customer_reviews.author: alejandro solis

customer_reviews.title: Charger not the same as the picture
customer_reviews.text: The charger I received is not the cradle type as shown in the picture
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Buchman

customer_reviews.title: They work great. We are looking into a better set of ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves his new set. They work great. We are looking into a better set of bags because the two that come with it are on the thinner side, but other than that it was a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: kimberly kitchen

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: perfect set for DIY, and is not cheaply made. I would suggest extra batteries pkg with fast charger, especially with the saw and grinder if your doing a bigger job. For the price, its great. would buy it again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: benF

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. Haven't tested everything in the set yet but ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Haven't tested everything in the set yet but they are comparable to after market batteries. The only downside of this set is the charger is a joke and does not have a base but just a cheap slide in unit that attaches to the battery. I will be buying a base style charger soon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good value
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son who is a new home owner with some repairs to do. They are not the quality you would use everyday if you were a contractor building houses, but they seem to be perfect for maintaining the average house and doing average projects.
customer_reviews.author: Derick D. Cummins

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for around my house. Have had a few months now with no issues. I by no means am not a contractor but I have redone my whole flooring, baseboards and multiple other projects around my house.
customer_reviews.author: Rial allen

customer_reviews.title: A bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: Incredible kit that comes with so many tools for such an amazing price. I've had them for over 6 months now with no problems whatsoever! This kit saved me tons of money because I needed a whole new kit. The shipping was fast.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: save your money and buy good tools.
customer_reviews.text: not very durable product i used my impact very little and im already having problems with the forward and reverse button. save your money and buy good tools.
customer_reviews.author: ashhuber

customer_reviews.title: Excellent set at $500, absolute STEAL at $400!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this set. My only regret is not buying it sooner. They handle everything that I can throw at it. I'm almost done refinishing a basement using almost only these tools. The only thing the buyer should be aware of is that the drills included with this set are lower power than buying the individual tools. This does not apply to ALL of the tools included, but just the drills (that I'm aware of).
customer_reviews.author: JF

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Was great untill the drill got so hot that it melted. And I was hanging drywall
customer_reviews.author: Alx C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Overall a great set would recommend getting a second set of batteries and a extra charger
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Swortfiguer

customer_reviews.title: Only for limited use
customer_reviews.text: Decent starter set for someone doing occasional light work. The more powerful tools like the grinder and circular saw really need the big battery to get anything done. The drill and impact driver are pretty good. Not a good set for regular use.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew W. Merrill

customer_reviews.title: Porter cable tools works for a small budget
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with porter cable tools. I’m not a professional and don’t need to purchase anything extravagant, just something to get the job done. These work amazingly well. I’ve built small furniture with them and fixed things around the house. If you need go to equipment on a budget, these are the tools to get.
customer_reviews.author: Jratz

customer_reviews.title: Love the set but only got one bag and the zipper broke.
customer_reviews.text: I love this set but just realized I only got one kit bag and the zipper broke immediately. Guess I will contact the manu and see if they will give me new bags Will update on the company.
customer_reviews.author: Miss OJ Higgins

customer_reviews.title: but very good quality for the $
customer_reviews.text: Only used a few of the tools so fsr, but very good quality for the $.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: PORTER-CABLE 20V MAX Cordless Drill Combo Kit, 8-Tool (PCCK619L8)
product_meta.description: Style:8 Tool Kit with GrinderThe PORTER-CABLE PCCK619L8 20V Max 8-Tool Combo Kit provides the tools needed to get the job done. This kit consists of : 1/2" Drill/Driver, 1/4" Impact Driver, 6 1/2" Circular Saw, Reciprocating Tiger Saw, Jig Saw, Oscillating Multi-tool, Cutoff tool/grinder, and LED flashlight. The Drill features a high-performance motor and a two-speed gear box that delivers the power needed to complete tasks easily. The Impact driver offers 1450 in/lbs of torque, and 0-2,800 RPM, 0-3,100 BPM. The 6-1/2" Circular Saw has a high-performance motor that delivers 4000 RPM's for aggressive cutting, and a beveling shoe that pivots up to 50 degrees. The Reciprocating Saw delivers 1" stroke length and 0-3,000 SPM with a compact design allows tool to reach tight spaces and a tool free blade release. The Jig Saw features 3 orbital settings and a variable speed trigger (0-2,500 SPM). The Oscillating Multi-Tool also offers a variable speed dial (8K-18K OPM) along with a LED work light for better visibility. The Cutoff Tool operates on a high-performance motor that produces 8,500 rpm and has a 3-position side handle for easy of use. And finally, the Flashlight has a pivoting head with 4 LED bulbs that delivers 120 Lumens. Kit includes: PCC601 1/2" Drill Driver, PCC641 1/4" Impact Driver, PCC660 6 1/2" Circular Saw, PCC670 Reciprocating Tiger Saw, PCC650 Jig Saw, PCC710 Oscillating Multi-Tool, PCC761 Cutoff tool/grinder, PCC700 LED Flash light, (1) PCC680 1.5Ah battery (1) PCC685 4.0Ah battery (1) PCC699L 1amp charger (2) kit bags. Power Tool Type - Cordless
feature_bullets: PERFORMANCE: Delivers power to complete a wide range of jobsite applications.
ERGONOMIC DESIGN: Lightweight tools designed to fit the users' needs.
RELIABILITY: Tools backed by a 3 year limited warranty.
INCLUDES: Drill Driver, Impact Driver, Circ Saw, Tiger Saw, Jig Saw, Multi-Tool, Grinder, Flash light, 2 Batteries, Charger, 2 Bags
PART OF THE PORTER-CABLE 20V MAX* SYSTEM: Battery works with all Porter-Cable 20V MAX* lithium ion products.

specifications.Included Components: PCC601 1/2" Drill Driver, PCC641 1/4" Impact Driver, PCC660 6 1/2" Circular Saw, PCC670 Reciprocating Tiger Saw, PCC650 Jig Saw, PCC710 Oscillating Multi-Tool, PCC761 Cutoff tool/grinder, PCC700 LED Flash light, PCC685 20V MAX* Lithium Ion 4.0Ah battery, PCC680 20V MAX* Lithium Ion 1.5Ah battery, PCC699L Battery Charger, and
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars356 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
